name: luminous
content:
luminous adjective
(BRIGHT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
producing or reflecting bright light, especially in the dark: luminous clothing The library was lit by the luminous glow of laptops. Synonyms
aglow literary
lambent literary
More examplesFewer examplesThe make-up refects light and gives the skin a luminous glow.The fabric was impregnated with luminous paint which glowed as they marched.I could see no stars, and only by a vague, luminous haze knew the presence of a moon.
